• Listen to a variety of original compositions, including vocal, orchestral, and instrumental recordings.

Daily Text
• Start your day with a Bible verse and comments containing positive, upbuilding thoughts.

Meetings
• Access material for both midweek and weekend meetings in one location.

Search
• Find specific Bible verses, content, and topics.

Personal Study
• Highlight text, add personal notes, and categorize with tags.

Playlists
• Create and organize playlists of music, videos, audio programs, and pictures.

* JW Library is an official app produced by Jehovah’s Witnesses.

apps.title: Dwell: Audio Bible
apps.description:
“One of my favorite apps out there. Another way to immerse myself in God’s word.” 
– Matt Chandler

“I can’t begin to rave enough about Dwell and how formational it is.” 
– Ann Voskamp

WHAT CAN I DO WITH DWELL?

Listen
Dwell is the best way to listen to the Bible, with 20+ different voice options and 12 different versions so far!  

Read Along
See and hear the Bible like never before with Dwell’s Read Along experience. Follow the text of Scripture as it scrolls down the screen, synchronized to the narrator’s voice.  

Read
Reading the Bible on your phone has never been more enjoyable. You can fully tailor your Read experience, with tastefully curated themes, fonts, and more! 

Sleep
Fall asleep to the word of God being read over. As we sleep, we are reminded that we are dependent creatures. The Lord renews and sustains us as we learn to rest in him. 

Memorize
Memorizing Scripture is key to an abiding life with Christ. Move the Word of God from the screen deep into your heart using Dwell’s Repeat and Reflect feature.

Build a Habit
Growth in Christ does not happen by accident. This way of life must be intentionally cultivated daily. Use any of Dwell’s 75+ listening plans (+notifications) to stay rooted in Scripture.

Create and Share with Friends
Keep your favorite passages close to your heart! Easily create personalized Scripture playlists to suit any theme or spiritual focus. Share these curated playlists with friends to inspire and encourage their faith journey.

Browse & Discover
Browse popular verses, plans, or curated playlists that include select verses by theme. Or just pick a book and dive in!

Access all of the Bible online or offline by signing up for a free 7-day trial. Download Dwell now and transform the way you experience Scripture.


OUR FREE 7-DAY TRIAL GIVES YOU ACCESS TO ALL OF DWELL:

* Listen, Read Along or just Read the Bible

* Enjoy 20 distinct voice recordings of the Bible

* 14 versions of the Bible, including ESV, NIV, KJV, NKJV, CSB, NRSV, NLT, ICB, NVI, NVIP, NASB and the Message.

* Search and listen to Scripture with ease

* Explore the Bible like never before

* Create and Share Playlists with Friends

* Favorite passages you cherish

* Get reminders to listen to the Daily Bible Verse

* Download and listen to Scripture offline

* Repeat and reflect on Scripture at any time

* Layer intimate background music into your Scripture listening experience 

* Enjoy beautiful album art for every book of the Bible, Plan, Playlist, Story, and curated Passage

* Experience a clean, intuitive UI design, showcasing a dark color scheme to help you focus on what matters

* Unlimited access to…

  * 75+ Listening Plans, e.g., The Bible in a Year, The Parables of Jesus, etc., that guide you through books or topics one day at a time

  * 260+ curated Passages of the most popular Bible verses - a wonderful place to begin if you’re unsure of where to start

  * 60+ Playlists that help you travel through Scripture by theme


DWELL SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

Dwell offers either a monthly or annual auto-renewing subscription:

• Dwell Annual: $59.99 per year (after free 7-day Trial)
• Dwell Monthly: $9.99 per month

These prices are for US customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Your Dwell subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Find our terms and conditions here:
https://dwellapp.io/terms_of_service

Find our privacy policy here:
https://dwellapp.io/privacy_policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
#Just in time for the holidays!

Dwell now has a dedicated in-app page for gifting.

Looking to give Dwell as a gift? You can now start the process right inside the app: just open Settings → Dwell Gifting to get started.

This update also includes general improvements and bug fixes to make your Dwell experience even smoother.

apps.title: iCCAM
apps.description:
iCCAM est la première solution d'aide au codage des actes avec la CCAM (Classification Commune des Actes Médicaux) pour iPhone et iPad, offrant l'accès à l'intégralité de la CCAM.

Avec l'abonnement optionnel "iCCAM Plus" sont proposés:
• une recherche facile et rapide d'un acte dans l'intégralité de la nomenclature en vigueur (plus de 8000 actes)
• la possibilité de constituer des listes d'actes favoris
• le calcul des honoraires pour les interventions comportant un ou plusieurs actes.

iCCAM ne nécessite pas de connexion internet.

iCCAM pour iPhone/iPad peut synchroniser ses favoris avec la version Mac du même logiciel.

Cette application est adaptée au mode multitâche de l'iPad.

-------------------------

ABONNEMENT "iCCAM Plus"":

IMPORTANT : les acheteurs des version de iCCAM antérieures à la version 1.7 bénéficient gratuitement des fonctionnalités incluses dans l'abonnement "iCCAM Plus" sans nécessité de souscrire. Utilisez la fonction "Restaurer vos achats" si besoin.

Vous disposez d'un mois d'essai gratuit sans engagement.

Après la période d'essai, le paiement sera débité du compte iTunes.

• L'abonnement se renouvelle automatiquement sauf si le renouvellement automatique est désactivé au moins 24 heures avant la fin de la période en cours.
• Le renouvellement sera facturé sur le compte dans les 24 heures précédant la fin de la période en cours et identifie le coût du renouvellement.
• Les abonnements peuvent être gérés par l'utilisateur et le renouvellement automatique peut être désactivé en accédant aux paramètres du compte de l'utilisateur après l'achat.

Vous pouvez lire nos conditions générales de vente et conditions d'utilisation à l'adresse:
https://iccam.fr/cgvu.html

apps.title: Sibha سبحة
apps.description:
جزاكم الله خيرا وتقبل منا ومنكم صالح الاعمال

لقد استمعت إليكم و اتمنى ان يرقى هذا التحديث لتطلعاتكم

تطبيق يمكِّن المستخدم من التسبيح و الذكر اينما كان

ميزات التطبيق
- مجموعات الأذكار (أذكار الصباح والمساء)
- قابلية تفعيل او تعطيل الصوت / الاهتزاز اثناء التسبيح
- إمكانية إضافة أو حذف أذكار
- إمكانية تصفير عداد كل ذكر منفصلاً أو جميع العدادات معا
- إمكانية جعل التطبيق يذكرك بأوقات الذكر التي تختارها
- مشاركة الأذكار
- مجموعة جميلة من الخلفيات مع إمكانية إضافة خلفيتك المفضلة من البوم الصور


THANK YOU FOR HELP, SUPPORT, AND FEEDBACK

I listened to you, and I hope this version meets your expectations 

Anyone can do Tasbih or Zikr wherever they are, whenever they want

Features
- Prayers Sets with ability to add new sets
- Enable or Disable (Sound / Vibration) while saying prayers
- Add / Delete Prayers
- Reset individual prayer counter or all together
- App can remind you on times you choose
- Share prayers
- Beautiful set of backgrounds to choose from plus an option to pick your favorite background from your Photos

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- بعض الاصلاحات البسيطة 


- Minor bug fixes

apps.title: 中国法律汇编 - 法律法规/司法解释
apps.description:
收录了2000多部中华人民共和国法律法规，全部免费开放浏览！便捷的分类浏览操作，快速索引定位，全文搜索，书签收藏！

如果您发现有未及时更新的条款或者文本错误，请随时联系我们进行反馈，我们会保持更新，谢谢。

软件特色：
1. 法律法规详细分类，一键查找
2. 全文检索，标题与章节检索
3. 快速索引定位
4. 升级功能后可一键复制相关条款，并发送给指定邮箱

适合法律专业者随身查找使用，比如律师，法律学者，法律专业学生，公务员考试等。

Chinese Laws 法律大类一览：
国际法、行政及行政诉讼、经济法、民法、民事诉讼及仲裁、商法、司法制度及法职、宪法、刑法、刑事诉讼

细分类别众多，可使用查找功能快速获取，比如直接搜索保险、贷款、抵押、信贷、托管、索赔、贸易等都可以获得相应的条款及条文明细结果。

apps.title: OGC Publications
apps.description:
The OGC Mobile App is designed for all Christians needing a platform to listen to and read the powerful message of the Kingdom. It is available in Portuguese, English, and French.
Whether you are driving to work, working on your chores, or even waiting in the doctor’s office, you can find much Christian content on OGC.
Here is what you can find:
All Books by Onório Cutane, which are in both English and Portuguese. You can also purchase the paperback version through the app;
All Podcasts by Onório Cutane;
All Albums of Janifer Cutane;
Content by other Christian writers and artists approved by OGC Publications.

EXPLORE THE APP
You can listen to a 30 sec preview of each song, 1 minute of each podcast episode, and access to the full description of each book for free. This way, you can decide which book, song or podcast you want to purchase. No matter what you decide, you must create an account first to access the app’s content.

HAVE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
The good thing about our app is that it allows all your purchased products to be in one place that can be quickly accessed. As soon as you open your profile, you can find the page “My Library” dedicated to your purchased books, “My Music” containing all songs you’ve purchased, and “My Podcasts,” where you can find all your purchased series.

PROFILE FEATURES
You have the option to “Edit Profile,” where you can personalize it. You can change your personal details such as name, email, and country here. You can also change your password or delete your account through “Settings.”

BE ON TOP OF EVERY NEW RELEASE
By activating your notifications, you can also be the first to know when a new book release, album, or podcast episode comes out. So remember to always keep up to date!

SECURITY
We used the power of technology to protect and secure our users’ personal data. From emails to payment information, all data input on OGC Publications will only be transferred using the latest, most advanced technologies that encrypt, secure, and safeguard all this information using certificates authority.

CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY
OGC Publications wants to support other Christian artists all around the globe, so if you’d like your content showcased in our app, please get in touch with us via the contact you see on AppStore or complete the form available on our website www.ogcpublications.com . Together, we expand the Gospel and bring light to those who need it!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Minor bug fixes
Users can now change password to their preferred password
New available app version prompt
Weekly notifications activated
